metadata.Title: CVE-2018-14363 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - medium.
metadata.Description:
An issue was discovered in NeoMutt before 2018-07-16. newsrc.c does not properly restrict '/' characters that may have unsafe interaction with cache pathnames.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-14363` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

neomutt - 20180716+dfsg.1-1.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: neomutt package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '20180716+dfsg.1-1.2').
